thread.title: Ben Affleck and Matt Damon Have an Adorable Reunion
thread.title_full: Ben Affleck and Matt Damon Have an Adorable Oscars Reunion

author: Erica Gonzales
title: Ben Affleck and Matt Damon Have an Adorable Reunion
text:
Nineteen years ago, buddies Ben Affleck and Matt Damon won an Academy Award for Best Original Screenplay for their work on Good Will Hunting . Nearly two decades later, they took the Oscars stage together again, this time to present the same title. Affleck and Damon were introduced to the stage as "two-time academy award winner and guest," respectively (thanks to Jimmy Kimmel). They presented the Oscar to Kenneth Lonergan, who produced the screenplay for Manchester by the Sea , a film that Damon produced and Affleck's younger brother Casey starred in.
 This is what the duo looked like tonight:
Getty
